meaningMnemonic: On a <radical>scooter</radical> running in one <radical>direction</radical> is a <radical>gun</radical>-toting <radical>child</radical>. This is a terribly dangerous situation, but to the child it is just <kanji>play</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Everything is <kanji>play</kanji> for <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう), even if it's a terrible, scary, not good situation like this one.
